########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR}) # added to find boost libraries
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS}) # same as above

list(APPEND itais_sources
    corr_est_cc_impl.cc
    freqest_impl.cc
    invert_impl.cc
    pdu_to_nmea_impl.cc
    msk_timing_recovery_cc_impl.cc
    Build_Frame_impl.cc
    nrz_to_nrzi_impl.cc
    DebugME_impl.cc
    selector_39_impl.cc )

set(itais_sources "${itais_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT itais_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT itais_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-itais SHARED ${itais_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-itais gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gnuradio::gnuradio-fft gnuradio::gnuradio-filter
                      gnuradio::gnuradio-blocks Volk::volk)

#gnuradio-itais gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gnuradio::gnuradio-fft gnuradio::gnuradio-filter) ## The last two were added in order to not have a swig error, following this: https://github.com/gnuradio/gnuradio/issues/2798
target_include_directories(gnuradio-itais
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-itais PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_itais_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-itais PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-itais)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_itais_sources)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-itais)

if(NOT test_itais_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_itais_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_itais_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("itais_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
